name: Prime
message: Prime is a very quick learner and quickly graps key concepts of Web development.He got a very good problem solving skills and he is very good at competitive programming. He is a very good team player and always ready to help others. He is a very good friend of mine and I wish him all the best for his future.

name: Alisha
message: Working with Prime was a great experience. He is a very hardworking and dedicated person. He is very passionate about his work and always tries to learn new things. He is a very good team player and always ready to help others. He is a very good game developer and web developer. He is also a very good competitive programmer. He is a very good friend of mine and I wish him all the best for his future.
